s4489: Twenty-eighth year: sent Zi Nang to rescue Zheng.
s4490: Thirteenth year: Zheng attacked us, Wei came to rescue.
s4495: Third year: Jin led the feudal lords to attack us, Chu came to rescue. Zi Kong created disorder, Zi Chan attacked him.
s4501: Eleventh year: the three Huan divided into three armies, each commanding generals.
s4503: Eleventh year: led the feudal lords to attack Zheng, Qin defeated us at Yue. The duke said: 'I used Wei Jiang to unite the nine feudal lords,' granted him music.
s4504: Fifteenth year: we sent Shu Zhang Bao to attack Jin and rescue Zheng, defeated them at Yue.
s4505: Twenty-ninth year: with Zheng attacked Song.
s4506: Fourteenth year: Chu and Zheng attacked us.
s4511: Fourth year: with Chu attacked Song, Jin led the feudal lords to attack us, Qin came to rescue.
s4517: Twelfth year: the duke went to Jin.
s4537: Thirty-first year: Wu attacked us, defeated them. Gong Wang passed away.
s4545: Wu Zhu Fan first year: Chu defeated us.
s4550: Twenty-third year: Wei Xian Gong came fleeing.
s4551: Fourteenth year: led the feudal lords' ministers to attack Qin, defeated at Yu Lin.
s4552: Eighteenth year: Jin and the feudal lords' ministers attacked us, defeated at Yu Lin.
s4553: Chu Kang Wang Zhao first year: Gong Wang's heir fled to Wu.
s4555: Eighteenth year: Sun Wen Zi attacked the duke, duke fled to Qi, established Ding Gong's younger brother Di.
s4561: Second year: Ji Zi yielded the throne. Chu attacked us.
s4565: Fifteenth year: solar eclipse. Qi attacked us.
s4567: Fifteenth year: Dao Gong passed away.
s4571: Wei Shang Gong Di first year: Ding Gong's younger brother.
s4581: Sixteenth year: Qi attacked us. Earthquake. Qi again attacked our northern borders.
